page.title: 11EMPLOYMENT IN FINZEAN.
page.content: Farming and estate work,including forestry and game management account for most employment.There are{16 {farmers}including the estate owner, the other 15 being his tenants, 9 farmworkers,all family members, and{8 {estate workers.} There are{18 full_time jobs}available {in Finzean,30 people are self-employed and{55 commute}from Finzean to work, mostly to Banchory,Aberdeen or Aboyne. There are{10 residents}in oil-related jobs,sometimes off-shore and one marine engineer commutes from Norway. 4 housewives work part-time in the shortbread and oatcake factory in the nearby Forest of Birse whilst four are occasionally employed as homehelps. There is{no unemployment}in Finzean except for 3 young men who prefer a variety of casual work.
